name: Dr.Jeevadoss S

in_brief:
Dr. S. Jeevadoss currently holds the position of Assistant Professor, Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology, India. He is working in this institution since June 2016. 
He received his PhD in Mathematics. His research interest graph decomposition and design theory. His research publications include many peer reviewed International Journals and conference papers. 
He has been a Mathematical Reviewer (American Mathematical Society) and a Zentralblatt MATH Reviewer (European Mathematical Society).
He is a recognized supervisor  in Anna University for Ph.D. research scholars (Ref.No. 2670069). He qualified the Tamil Nadu State Eligibility Test (SET) for Lectureship held on 21st February, 2016 in the subject Mathematical Sciences, conducted by Mother Teresa Women’s University, Kodaikanal.

publications.journal: AKCE International Journal of Graphs and Combinatorics
